rounds.base:
He walked into the room. People were talking. He waited by the door.

Nothing in the space told him where to stand, so he held still.

palette.text:
He set a chipped cup on the table.

The scrape carried a dry, patient note.

The light kept blinking over the sink.

Every pause made the shadows lean.

He seemed very nervous.

It was hard to tell why.

The door latch clicked and didnâ€™t catch.

Air slipped through the seam and cooled his knuckles.

rounds.design_note: Concrete detail carries weight; a small shift in the field steadies the scene.
